h1.div: Welcome to our Educational Resources site.

div.p: Please see the page links below for information specific to each grade level, as well as the Activities Without Technology page. Please monitor your children while on the computer to ensure they do not click into a website or area they should not be on.
We also encourage you to check out the parents page for some helpful resources. Please check back often as we continue to update this site.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato;
font-family: Lato;
span.strong: Compatibility Requirements: Students will need the i-Ready for Students iPad app to access i-Ready. This app is only available on iPads that are compatible with iOS 10.3 or above. These iPad models currently include the iPad (5th generation), iPad (4th generation), iPad Air, iPad Air 2, and iPad Pro. i-Ready for Students is free and available for download through the Apple App StoreSM. i-Ready for Students is not supported on iPad minis, and it is not accessible on other tablets or iPhones,

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato;

div.p: Visit our Youtube Channel to see our teacher made videos covering different subject area standards, read alouds, and many more topics. Check back often as new videos are being added daily.

p.span: Haga clic en el enlace y el sitio web o página a la que navega se traducirá en el idioma que elija.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: 2. أدخل https://sites.google.com/pgsd.ms/educationresources/ في المربع الأيسر لإنشاء رابط قابل للنقر في المربع الموجود على اليمين.
3. يؤدي هذا إلى إنشاء ارتباط مترجم.
4. انقر على الرابط وسيتم ترجمة موقع الويب أو الصفحة التي يتنقل إليها باللغة التي تختارها.
